mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (product_name, capacity, brand, current_stock, new_stock) VALUES (#{name}, #{capacity}, #{brand}, #{currentStock}, #{newStock})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_code = #{code}, product_name = #{name}, capacity = #{capacity}, brand = #{brand}, current_stock = #{currentStock}, new_stock = #{newStock} WHERE product_id = #{id}
